== Maoritios == Maoritios nikapolongan kitakit itira i sakakawali to 800 konhli no Madagascar nikapolongan kitakit, no Intoyang a palapalaan, oni kanatal – Maoritios kanatal (Maoritios) ato Agalega palapalaan (Agalega Islands), Rodrigoez palapalaan ato Cargados-Carajos palapalaan malakapot. Dadahal no kitakit 2,040 pinfang kongli. Lilis no riyar a calay 177 kongli, no niyah a riyar 12 li, patodong no kicay a riyar 200 li . Maoritios pala nano i 10 sician nano manengnengay no Arab tamdaw. I 16 sici, Portogal tamdaw micalap tina pala. I 1598 miheca Netherland tamdaw micalap tina pala, itiya o kakomodan no Netherland ci Maorits van Nassao a ngangan ko pipanganganan. I 1715 miheca France micalap tonini palaan miteka ira ko mafolaway, miliyaw pangangan to France a pala ahan. O Inkiris i 1810 miheca kalaloodan ni Napoleonmicalap tina pala, o France i Vienna tonekan pafeli tina Maoritios to Inkiris, tina tonekan tilid saka 8 riyad teleken to itiniay i pala a finawlan ira ko pidipot no rikec, lakakawa ato pakayraan, orasaka o Maoritios tangasa anini materek ko France a sowal ato lakakawa. Na mikowan to ko Inkiris patiko to matelangay ngangan no Maoritios. I 1835 miheca mihayda ko Inkiris to pipalasawad to mifadesay a rikec, na masedal ko mafadesay a kohetingay tamdaw caay to kakahidademak to liomah ato patireng to loma', na itiya makotay to no 'alomanay a India a malingaday; Moslin ato holam tayni a misiwfay malaliaca, masasinga'ay ko kasafanacadan sakamitini aniniay Maoritios a tamdaw. Maoritios i 1968 miheca 3 folad 12 romi'ad mihapiw misiiked, o salaloma'ananay no Tata'akay Inkiris a Lekatep, mingodo to hongti no Inkiris o sawara'an no kitakit, congto a taypiaw ko midemakay, ikor i 1992 miheca 3 folad 12 romi'ad mafalic to o Nikapolongan Kitakit, midemak to kalomaocan no Nikapolongan lakakawa, congtong o patodongan to sawara'an aca, congtong ato micokeray congtong o nai kalomaocan a nisingkiwan, 5 miheca ko lekad (padoedo to kinacecay), o congli ko citodongay to dademaken . O tamdaw nai India teloc, Frane Africa a camel (Cleo tamdaw), holam teloc, Eorope tamdaw malekapot . Maoritios a sasowalen o no Maoritios a Cleo sowal, France ato Inkiris sowal. Inkiris sowal o no malatapangay sowal, nika malali'ay to no Maoritios a Cleo sowal ato France sowal. O sinpon ato tilifi a kamok o no France a sowal. No tamdaw a ponka Tamdaw Midotoc i 2010 miheca 7 folad a pisa'osi, Maoritios a tamdaw salongan ira ko 128.6 'ofad, o fainayan 63.3 'ofad, fafahiyan 65.2 'ofad. 124.8 'ofad tamdaw maro'ay I pala no Maoritios, maro'ay i Rodrigoez pala a tamdaw ira ko3.8 'ofad, Agalega pala atoCargados-Carajos pala a tamdaw ira ko 289 tamdaw. Polong no kitakit no Maoritios tamdaw, 0-14 miheca tamdaw ira 22.5% (fainayn 14.7 'ofad, fafahiyan ira ko 14.2 'ofad), 15-64 miheca tamdaw ira 70.4% (fainayn 44.9 'ofad, fafahiyan ira ko 45.5 'ofad), kakaay no 65 miheca tamdaw ira ko 7.1% (fainayn 3.6 'ofad, fafahiyan ira ko 5.4 'ofad), tamdaw kacomahad 0.776%. salongan 42% a Maoritios tamdaw maro' i maci. (nai 2008 miheca nipolongan a sa'osi) . Nawhani o nano likisi a nidoedoan, Maoritios tamdaw kasairaira no finacadan mapapolong, o Into a Maoritios tamdaw a sa'alomanay, tamdaw ira ko 68%, doedo o Creole tamdaw (27%), Holam Maoritios tamdaw (3%), France Maoritios tamdaw (2%) ato Eorope tamdaw (0.5%). Sowal Maoritios tamdaw ki'aloman to Maoritios Creole sowal, Inkiris sowal ato France sowal, kaimanan mafafalic ko sowal . Maoritios a kimpo awaay ko patodong to sowal no kitakit, dengan i kalomaocan maketon o Inkiris ko sakasasowal no kitakit, nikawrira o lomaocay manga'ay o France a sowal ko sakalalicay . Polong no sasowalen, o Inkiris sowal ato France a sowal ko nisowalan no kitakit, kai kademakay, hoying, kalali'acaan citodongay. O kimpo no Maoritios o Inkiris a tilid ko sapitilid, o roma a rikec, tinako finawlan a rikec, o France a soal ko matiliday. No France sowal matiya to no Inkiris sowal ko nika tadamaan ko piraoy i syakay, o sapipasifana' ato kacitatodong maalaay ko adihayay . O sapipasifana' no pitilidan o Inkiris a sowal ato France sowal, itira i Maoritios to piparatoh ato no tilidan a mitiya o sowal no France sakasasowal . Maoritios a tamdaw mararid a sakasasowal o no Maoritios Creole a sowal. Creole a sowal o tadasowal no Maoritios a tamdaw saan, saka 90% a Maoritios a tamdaw ko somowalay to Creole a sowal, sahetoay i niyaro' masowal . Onini a sowal mapalamlamay to no France a sowal ato ngiha , no roma ira ko nano Inkiris sowal, Ponjab sowal. Matiniay a sowal macowat nai 18 sici, itiya i masafadesay o sakanga'ay malalicay to nai France micingcingay ato nai romaay a niyaro' a nifadesan, macowat to ko macacamolay a pinapina a sowal to Pichin sowa (ano eca "masasifoday sowal") saka ira. Mtaelif to ko pinapina a mihecaan a marayray, onini a Pichin a sowal malasakasasowalen to romi'ami'ad , oya aniniay a Creole a sowal. O kasasowalan halo Into sowal, Tamil sowal, Malayalam sowal, Marathi sowal, Urdo sowal, Gojarat sowal, Ponjab sowal, nawhani ira ko caay ka papina a Holam a ngayngay malinahay, ngayngay a sowal i no holam a niyaro' sakasasowalen . Polong no Maoritios a tamdaw mafana'ay to tosaay a sakasasowal, roma a tamdaw ira ko mafana'ay to toloay ano eca adihayay a sowal . Kiwiko Nawhani pakayniay i likisi, faco sapikiwiko no Maoritios o Inkiris ko pakayraan. Maoritios sifo caay papayso to sapitilid tangasa i Daykako a kiwiko. Nai 2005 miheca 7 folad miteka, polong no mitiliday patodong ko sifo to caay pa'aca to sapikalic to faso. 2011 miheca, sapikiwiko a yosang mapasadakay 117 walwalan no Maoritios a ropee. Mi'awid to sakipayso no sifo a masadakay to 12.5% . Malisepatay liyad ko kiwiko no Maoritios. Nai 'ayaw a kiwiko 3 miheca; sa'ayaway piteka a kiwiko o pipatado a pikiwiko, 6 miheca; tenokay kiwiko saliyad 5 miheca cocong ato 2 miheca a kawcong; 'akawangay kiwiko halo daykako, patodongan kakying ato tadamaanay sakifana' pitilidan. I Maoritios tosa ko daykak a Maoritios daykak ato Maoritios mikingkiway (likong) daykak. O Maoritios 'akawangay kiwiko wiyyinhoy misahalaka patireng to malasa'etalay kiwiko patodongan. Kicay O kicay no Maoritios o cimalalifetay a kitakit i no Africa. I 2020 miheca, midoedo to kalali'acaan no maci FDF no Maoritios pali'ayawan misa'osi ira ko 145 walwalan no Amilika payso, o micomoday no tamdaw salongan ira ko 11,630 payso no Amilika, o 'a'ayaway no Africa a kitakit. Nai 1968 miheca na misiiked itiya, nao caayay ka comahad ko kicay a maomahay macomahad to ko Maoritios a macakat ko masamaanay a kicay, o lakapot no kicay halo mirarakatay, mitinooyay, misa'odaxay ato sakipayso. Toni ngata no mihecaan, sakiratoh kinaira ato tingwa kinaira, no nanom kinaira, loma' kinaira, isingan kinaira, midotocay a nengyin, kiwiko a kinaira malosakatadamaan no sakaira no kinaira no Maoritios a kicay, ato misolot to papotalay a mikihatiya mipadafoh. To hatiniay, o Maoritios to mihecaan macakat ko kicay 5% tangasa 6%, mikakakaay to katimolay no Sahala Africa kanatal ko kacakat . O masongila'ay to mapatireng ko maci kicay no Maoritios. Midotoc 2010 miheca pakoniraay kicay sa'osi, i polong no ckiw 183 a kasakicay, o macelakay ko kicay, masongila'ay ko pikantok, marikecay ato malalifetay ko patodong, o kicay no Maoritios a mapakonira mikerid to katimolay no Sahala Africa kanatal ko kacakat, o saka 12 ko kaitiraan i hekal. I kingko no hekal mihapiw to kasa kitakit no kalali'aca a tisil, padoedo to 4 miheca (2008-2012) ko Maoritios a sa'ayaway a kicay no Africa, i polong no cikiw 183 kicay lekatep saka 23 ko aro'. O patosokan no Maoritios malosaka 10 no polong no cikiw ko sanga'ayay a pikadepan ato kalali'acaan a kitakit. Nakawrira 1999 miheca o kakedalan makari'ang ko misatefosay a milingaday, nanoya misetek ko sifo to pisolot to papotalan a mikadepay sakacowat no kicay. Anini mata'elif to ko 9,000 riwang o nai Into atoi Sooth Africa a miliyasay to hekal a kosi patireng i Maoritios, padengan o pikadep to kingko i mataelif to ko 10 walwalan Amilika payso. 'ayaway a mikowanay a France o sata'akay a cafay to kalali'acaan i Maoritios, padamso to adihayay sapatodong to kicic. O Maoritios caay ka dengan o sakacowat no kicay ko katadamaan, saki syakay micakatay, orasaka ano itira i sapakoyocay a tamdamdaw manga'ay mapadafoh nai kacowat no kicay . O nian koya "Lalekoan no Maoritios" 'aloman to ko kitakit mangalay pasayra to malecaday ko kicay ato syakay macakat . Nikawrira, mafesoay a dafong ato ira ko macakatay a saki'orip a masadak ko kararimaan, i 2006 miheca tangasa 2008 mihecaan, salongan mafesoay no Maoritios tangasa i 9.1%. Pida No Maoritios a pida o Maoritios ropee (pida a fangko: MUR). 1 a ropee matiya o 100 fen, nikawrira aniniay a romakatay a pida oya 5 fen, 20 fen ato 50 fen a payso, nai 2010 mihecaan, 5 fen ato 20 fen a pida caay to pisanga'. No Maoritios ropee nai 1876 miheca o maketonay to a pida no Maoritios, o pida a ngangan naitiyaay a kalocaliw no Into a ropee i Maoritios. Ropee no Maoritios nai 1877 miheca miteka makotay ko no Into a ropee ato malecaday kalocaliway i Maoritios British poond (Inpang) ato no Maoritios a payso. Itiya 1 ropee no Maoritios matiya 1 Into ropee ano eca malitosaay no Maoritios a payso. 1 British poond (Inpang) o 10.25 a ropee no Maoritios. O takomodan a romi'ad ko Maoritios, o tingalaway a farawfaway riyar, caayay kapawan a sapitikoaw a tafotafokan, kasatakomodan a molengaway a kinaira ato halihamhamay to lafang a tamdaw. Manga'ayay ko pakayraan a pirarakatan a Maoritios, maledef ko ko sapipatado no kamaro'an ato pipa'aliwacan . I 2010 miheca, saka'amis a niyaro' a Troo Aox Biches tafotafokan mapakakompay no hakalay i Intoyang a rarakatan o nga'ayay kaitiraan. 2012 miheca 1 folad, mapakaolah to sakinatolo no hekalay a kompay ko Maoritios o "o satadamaanay pirarakatan a kaitiraan a palapalaan", oya pakalayap to "safangcalay no hekal a tafotafokan" o sa'dihayay mitikoay a mirarakatan ko Maoritios . Tadamaanay no Amilika a mi'olicay tamdaw ci Mark Twain i nipirakarak ningra a nitilidan "pirarakatan i sakonis" sowal sa: "ira ko pasowalay 'ayaw no pisanga' no Kawas to kakarayan masanga' to ko Maoritios, ora a kakarayan o mitodongan to Maoritios a misanga'" . O Maoritios padamso to adihayay a kadademakan, mangalef ko liyok ato riyar a nanom mala pisalamaan a kakarayan, patiked, mikitapelik, pakopang, mi'eser to nanom, micelem, misatamina a kahirahira.
